timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this folder already exist because zipFilePath parent is ".../zippedSubmissions" and submissionFolderPath was already created and contains the path segment ".../zippedSubmissions"?

timeline.bodyText: Suggested change * @param paths the paths that should be zipped * @param paths the paths that should be zipped * @param pathsRoot the root path relative to paths

sleiss
sleiss
sleiss

timeline.bodyText:
This check caused some problems for me during testing: If you are both instructor/admin AND tutor, you cannot download all submissions.
I do not know if this is a real scenario in normal courses, but in test courses, this can happen.
Maybe you should change the check to something like submissionExportOptions.isExportAllParticipants() && !authCheckService.isAtLeastInstructorInCourse.
Also, no error message was shown to me, so I had to check the source code to identify the issue. Maybe you can display error messages in a follow up or so.
timeline.author: sleiss
sleiss
